title: Security Alert
body:
Just started getting security alert pop ups yesterday.

Anyone know the best way to fix this?

replies.body:
oh i though just me. its about certificate things .. 

after patch up , this been happening . never happen before. 

wish Rioter fix asap 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

#followup

#PSrektEnglish

I've seen a few reports about this, and I'm trying to find what's going on.  Go over our[ Login Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) guide to rule out some possibilities causing this interference like IE settings (which the client uses), or network configuration.  Let me know what you find!

Has a solution come from this of yet? It only pops up once, I can close with X, or click Yes/No and it wont come back until i log in again. Just a nuisance not a overall porblem. The "Issued To" On the certificate is www.bing.com so I'm guessing it has to do with IE somehow, though i've already tried a lot with IE.
yeah same with me I click the X and can continue to play ?

The same thing has been happening to me and i actually made a post about it. Its been happening for the past week, and i was concerned it had something to do with the cyber attacks that happened this week but i ruled that out. It pops up when i log in and pops up when i log out and then it crashes league. I tried setting my clock, and that didnt help. Nothing seems to be working. Ive even tried turning off certificates because in other pots i have seen that has helped, but it didnt for me. Hopefully it can be fixed?
